results.description:
Manipulation. The next utility skill you use has significantly reduced recharge, and Mimic's recharge is increased by the original recharge of the affected skill.
Mimic's recharge cannot be reset by other mesmer skills.

results.description:
Destroy all your clones and create a rift in the space-time continuum. When it expires, you will revert back to your original point with your previous health, endurance, and skill recharges. Duration increases with each illusion shattered.
This skill's recharge cannot be reset by other mesmer skills.

Kontinuum-Spaltung
Retour vers le passé

Glamour. Create an entry portal at your location that teleports allies to your exit portal.
(Creating a new entrance portal while you have an active portal will destroy the active portal.)
name: Portal Entre

results.description: Set an explosive that explodes into a puddle of glue, immobilizing foes caught in the explosion and crippling foes in the puddle.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.
Unable to move; stacks duration.

name: Glue Bomb
Bomba de pegamento

results.description: Create a Radiation Field at target location, inflicting poison and weakness on foes.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.
Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

name: Radiation Field

results.description: Advance forward, slashing foes in your way.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

name: Fiery Whirl

results.description: Leap to your target and stock a blade if you hit. Can be recast to return to your starting point.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

name: Blade Leap

results.description:
Signet Passive: Grant swiftness and an additional random boon every ten seconds.
Signet Active: Extends the duration of all boons on yourself.

facts.description: Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.
Skills recharge faster.
Critical chance increased; stacks duration.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Incoming strike damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.
Gain health every second; stacks duration.
Incoming condition damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.
Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.
Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.
Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.
Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.
Skills and actions are faster.

name: Signet of Inspiration
Sello de inspiración

results.description: Mantra. Meditate, charging a spell that will instantly heal you when activated. Heal yourself and nearby allies when this spell fully charges.
name: Mantra of Recovery

results.description: Mantra. Meditate, charging a spell that will cure conditions for you and nearby allies. Cure conditions on yourself and nearby allies when this spell is fully charged.
name: Mantra of Resolve

results.description: Glamour. Create a dome around your foes that reflects projectiles.
name: Feedback

results.description: Damage nearby foes with a ring of fire, burning foes that pass through it.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
After using a Lava Axe ability, your next Lava Axe attack fires twice.

name: Ring of Fire

results.description: Leap at your foe with a flaming attack that causes burning.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
After using a Lava Axe ability, your next Lava Axe attack fires twice.

name: Flame Leap

traited_facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

results.description: Throw two lava axes at your foe.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

name: Double Lava Axe

results.description: Throw a lava axe at your foe. Using another Lava Axe ability grants Double Lava Axe.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

name: Lava Axe

results.description: Psionic. Knock back nearby foes with a psychic blade and gain boons.

facts.description: Critical chance increased; stacks duration.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

name: Psychic Force
